name: RecoverableError
desc: A specialized error that may be recoverable by presenting several potential recovery options to the user.

items.name: var recoveryOptions: [String]
items.desc: Provides a set of possible recovery options to present to the user.

items.name: func attemptRecovery(optionIndex: Int) -> Bool
items.desc: Attempt to recover from this error when the user selected the option at the given index. Returns true to indicate successful recovery, and false otherwise.
